article_text:
We watched the Democratic debate Sunday night—this job isn’t all fun—wondering above all if Hillary Clinton would mention the name Donald Trump, as she did six times in the last debate, the Saturday before Christmas.

Our expectation was that she wouldn’t. During the past month, Trump has made an issue of Bill Clinton’s history of sexual harassment and alleged sexual assault, which is such a sensitive topic for Mrs. Clinton that it was taboo in 2008. We guessed that Mrs. Clinton would be so anxious to keep it that way that...

article_summary:
We guessed that Mrs. Clinton would be so anxious to keep it that way that...
During the past month, Trump has made an issue of Bill Clinton’s history of sexual harassment and alleged sexual assault, which is such a sensitive topic for Mrs. Clinton that it was taboo in 2008.
We watched the Democratic debate Sunday night—this job isn’t all fun—wondering above all if Hillary Clinton would mention the name Donald Trump, as she did six times in the last debate, the Saturday before Christmas.
Our expectation was that she wouldn’t.
